column2: since seeing wagyu beef on the Food Network and hearing about it's quality
column3: I had to have a dish that included it. My first experience with wagyu
column4: I noted its incredible tenderness and juicy flavor
column5: unlike any beef I've ever had. Inside the roll also included avocado
column6: and topped with leek crisps. I believe on the side was the yuzu kosho
column7: a kind of citrus sauce that completed the dish. To. Die. For.
